Submodules¶

PiKwonDo.GUI module¶

Classes for front-end display and screen-based input.

class pikwondo.gui.FrontEndController(main)¶

Bases: object

Central QT window manager for all GUI elements.

show()¶

Show the window.

update_ui()¶

Redraw all elements of GUI that may change during use.

class pikwondo.gui.LatestValueBoxIOQT(value=None)¶

Bases: object

A container which holds only the most recent object put in it.

The container provides threadsafe object storage and retrieval. Object get and place functions are pure python. The container instance emits a qt signal when a new object is placed in the container.

get()¶

Retrieve the latest object from the container.

Returns:The object placed in the container.
put(value)¶

Place an object in the container.

Parameters:value – Object to place in the container.
qt_signal¶
